Hydras:

Hydras was stuck by Rockseeker's shots and he collapsed


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Rockseeker took more damage, but this time, he felt the pain 
searing 
> in him. The surge was ending, and it was time to go. He switched 
his 
> guns and fired his dual gun at Hydras and his Radiant at 
Sharpclaw, 
> then jumped into the air and transformed. He had to get away 
before 
> it ended!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras::
> > 
> > Hydras roared with pain and he managed to aim and dificulty fire 
25 
> > shots against Rockerseeker
> >

> > > Rockseeker raised both arm to prevent taking too much damage. 
The

> Instead,

fired
